page.title: 01FAMILY LIFE IN WASHINGTON
page.content: On most mornings my mam,sister and I have breakfast;usually my dad is in bed after working on nightshifts.My mam usually takes us to school in the car.I get there just in time for a game of football before the bell goes.We all have to get lined up in the yard before we go in.In class,we do topic work which is about different countries. Most of the class enjoy it.On Monday nights I go to the school computer club.It runs on two nights Mondays and Tuesdays and I enjoy it because you can learn how to programme and understand computers. My dad is a policeman and I dont see much of him because his shifts are changing all of the time. On Saturday I go to the swimming baths at the Galleries while my mam and sister are shopping.
